alert.note: Alert for Craighead (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 12:23PM CST until January 04 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Saint Francis River at Lake City For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis, Lake City, Madison...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Francis River at Lake City. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding is occurring in the swamps along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM CST Sunday was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.2 feet on 01/08/1991. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
